REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f0748 reute u f BC-FIRST-AMERICAN-FINANC 03-19 0045

TEXT.TITLE: FIRST AMERICAN FINANCIAL<FAMR> IN SPECIAL PAYOUT
TEXT.BODY: First American Financial Corp said its board declared a special dividend of 20 cts per share and the regular 25 ct quarterly dividend, both payable April 15 to holders of record March 31. Reuter
